item.description:
All Day Rehab Seminar with Flip This House's Paul Esajian

Paul Esajian and Than Merrill built CT Homes into a multi-million dollar company in just three years. They buy and sell over fifty properties each year. Their rehab projects are not simple "duster," either. The average cost of their rehab work is around $35,000 per property.

Paul will share, in more detail, simple steps to managing your rehab projects:

•Do your homework
•Lay out a detailed scope of work that outlines your expectations
•Investigate the contractor's business before you go to contract
•How to control your rehab costs, so you never go over budget
•How to interview and pre-screen contractors so you never get burned
•How to organize and manage a project so you don't have to be on the jobsite 24 hours a day
•The 6 critical documents you need to get signed when working with contractors

All Day Seminar
8:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Saturday, April 17, 2010

Doubletree Guest Suites, 550 Winter Street, Waltham, MA

$29 for members; $59 for nonmembers; $129 at the door

Click here to register today!

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: All Day Rehab Seminar - Paul Esajian
